1.title: Howie Mandel & Nick Cannon, Again
1.plot: Hosted by Theo Von and executive produced by Howie Mandel, the second season of Deal With It features a jam-packed roster of guest celebrities and comedians helping pull over-the-top pranks on the unsuspecting public.

2.title: Happy Howie-ween with Ross Mathews & Bobby Lee
2.plot: FOOTBALL: A contestant has football on the brain and decides to kick off the new season while her friend watches from the sideline. Co-host: Bobby Lee.CHAMPAGNE PROBLEMS: After faking a foot injury, our contestant enlists the help of their friend, and then offers a thank you with a face full of foot. Co-host: Ross Mathews.

3.title: Jerry O'Connell and Jeannie Mai
3.plot: WINE TASTING: After our contestant hijacks a wine tasting seminar, and chugs from a $3,000 bottle of wine, her friend might just want a drink of her own. Co-host: Jeannie Mai. THE WILL: A contestant's daughter is having the worst day of her life, after her father informs her she's out of his will. The icing on the cake? He's letting his sexy new attorney handle the money. Co-host: Jerry O'Connell.

4.title: Kym Whitley & Josh Wolf
4.plot: STAKEOUT: After witnessing our contestant confiscate a stranger's personal belongings, this friend is doing all he can to prevent the paranoia from resulting in someone wearing handcuffs.

5.title: King Bach & Alex Mandel
5.plot: DOCTOR'S WAITING ROOM: After irritating several patients in a doctor's waiting room, a contestant has to deal with her husband's rising blood pressure. Co-host: Alex Mandel. HIGH SCHOOL SWEETHEART: A contestant takes the concept of mid-life crisis to a whole new level, as she is tasked with introducing her friend to Kevin, her high school sweetheart. Co-host: Andrew Bachelor "King Bach".

6.title: Howie Mandel & Jack Osbourne
6.plot: TURKEY DANCE: After demanding some turkey, then stealing two of the raw birds from a nearby counter, a contestant has his hands full trying to explain himself to his irritated wife. Co-host: Howie Mandel. THANKSGIVING: A contestant gets a little too caught up in the Thanksgiving spirit by drinking straight from a gravy boat, leaving her sister anything but thankful for her bizarre behavior. Co-host: Jack Osbourne.

7.title: Penn Jillette & Jessimae Peulo
7.plot: SPEED DATING (HALLMARK): After stumbling into a speed dating session, a contestant's girlfriend is in for the worst date of her life when an attractive woman wants to "lock-in" with her man. Co-host: Jessimae Peluso. CUPCAKE: Our contestant is unhappy with a cupcake focus group, and after being told not to eat any of the cupcakes, he decides to bite off more than he can chew, literally. Co-host: Penn Jillette.

8.title: Chuey Martinez & Josh Meyers
8.plot: NARCOLEPTIC: A contestant can't stay awake, and when slapping herself and splashing water on her face doesn't work, she has to get her friend to give her a rude awakening. Co-host: Chuey Martinez. YOGA CLASS (PRINGLES): A contestant is tasked with disrupting a yoga class by demonstrating his own obnoxious custom stretches. Co-host: Josh Meyers.

9.title: Melissa Peterman & Sarah Colonna
9.plot: NAWARDS LUNCH (REDD'S APPLE ALE): When her lunch is interrupted by a substitute teacher's appreciation ceremony, our contestant decides to show her support with a rousing cheer. Cohost: Melissa Peterman. BAD BOYFRIEND: After playing the part of the gentleman by helping a cute waitress clear a nearby table, this contestant's good deeds are not appreciated by his girlfriend, especially after he asks for the waitress' number. Co-host: Sarah Colonna.

10.title: Marlon Wayans & Mo Mandel
10.plot: INHERITANCE: As if revealing he's a gigolo for elderly women isn't difficult enough, this contestant has his hands full when his favorite client shows up and proposes an item to cross of her bucket list. Co-host: Mo Mandel. LIFESTYLE CHANGE: After introducing his wife to some people he met on an alternative lifestyle website that specializes in cuddling parties, the last thing this contestant's wife wants is a hug. Co-host: Marlon Wayans.

1.title: RC Chaos in Hotel
1.plot: RC Chaos in the Hotel: After causing a scene in a hotel lobby, our contestant must apologize to his buddy in the most sensible way possible, with a kiss on the lips. In the chair: Howie Mandel. Rascal #2: A female contestant has had enough with the terrible service, and decides to get the waitress' attention in an unusual way, by throwing a shoe at her. In the chair: Yvette Nicole Brown.

2.title: Shirts Off
2.plot: Shirts Off: Things get hot and heavy when our contestant is told to take his shirt off in the middle of a restaurant. The real challenge? He must get his friend to do the same. In the chair: Joan Rivers and Melissa Rivers. You're Getting Heavy: Our contestant struggles to keep his wife at lunch after he's instructed to tell her that she's looking a little heavy. In the chair: Mel B.

3.title: The Cult
3.plot: Hooker: Our contestant is put in the hot seat when a prostitute approaches asking for the money he owes her, and is tasked with explaining the whole thing to his infuriated girlfriend. In the chair: Bobby Lee.

4.title: Hypnotist
4.plot: Hypnotist: When a contestant can't stop yawning and sneezing, a nearby hypnotist offers his assistance, with some shattering results. In the chair: Josh Gad.

5.title: Blind Rose
5.plot: Blind Rose: A contestant is instructed to have wandering eyes for an attractive woman at a nearby table, and experiences his furious fiancÃ©'s jealous side with a face-full of water. In the chair: Adam Carolla

6.title: Nut Job
6.plot: Nut Job: A concerned friend seriously questions the sanity of our contestant after she is told to brush her teeth at the table and carry out conversations with figments of her imagination.

1.title: Hypochondriac/Best Medicine
1.plot: HYPOCHONDRIAC: What starts out as simple exercises in staying healthy quickly turns into a series of obsessive procedures, as our contestant finds creative ways of keeping the germs at bay. Co-host: Howie Mandel. BEST MEDICINE: When a contestant starts acting goofy after taking a mystery pill, her brother must try and stop her from grazing on the décor, and blowing on his belly button. Co-host: Nick Cannon

2.title: Heidi Klum, Roman Atwood & Dennis Roady
2.plot: ART CLASS: Beauty is only skin deep, and this contestant experiences that firsthand, after requesting that a model in an art class get nude for the sake of her sculpture. Co-host: Heidi Klum. CRIME FIGHTER: After witnessing a shady diner swipe some cash from a nearby table, our contestant dons a mask and cape, and gives the man a taste of vigilante justice by showing him the door...then throwing him through it. Co-hosts: Roman Atwood and Dennis Roady.

3.title: Tom Green & Iliza Shlesinger
3.plot: MEMORIAL: A devastated friend questions the morality of our contestant, after she's instructed to deface a deceased man's portrait during a memorial service. Co-host: Iliza Shlesinger. THE OTHER MAN: After instructing this contestant to reveal that he's divorcing her mother, his daughter's day can't get any worse. That is, until she meets her new step-dad. Co host: The Miz

4.title: Kendall & Kylie Jenner and Gary Owen
4.plot: CONVERTED: A contestant has converted to a new-age religion, and must put their rituals on display by anointing their friend with a blessing of barbeque sauce. Co-host: Gary Owen. DÉJÀ VU: A series of reoccurring events leaves this contestant in a loop, and his friend wondering whether or not she's losing her mind. Co-hosts: Kendall and Kylie Jenner.

5.title: Chris Jericho and Bill Engvall
5.plot: WITNESS RELOCATION: A contestant is instructed to disguise her identity, after a run-in with a couple of mobsters reveals a clue about her mysterious past. Co-host: Chris Jericho. BEAUTY SCHOOL PICKUP: When a beautiful beautician starts flirting with our contestant, he must enlist the help of the most awkward wingman ever...his girlfriend. Co-host: Bill Engvall.

6.title: Arsenio Hall and Alex Mandel
6.plot: TIGER URINE: After divulging her digestive issues, this contestant reveals her questionable new dietary supplement that leaves a bad taste in her friend's mouth. Co-host: David Koechner. YOUR BIGGEST FAN: A superfan's flattery goes a little too far, when our contestant is tasked with convincing her rock star boyfriend to let the creepy stranger stay the night at his place. Co-host: Alex Mandel.

7.title: Bob Saget and Chuey Martinez
7.plot: DOUBLE DATE: When our contestant reveals to her sister that she's set them both up on a blind date with two guys from the Internet, neither of their dates comes anywhere close to being "prince charming." Co-host: Chuey Martinez. EAT YOUR VEGETABLES: Bob Saget's new book "Dirty Daddy" inspires a bevy of bizarre behavior from our contestant, and when he ducks for cover, his date may just duck out the door. Co-host: Bob Saget.

8.title: Howie Mandel and Kevin Nealon
8.plot: CUTESY PIE: After whispering sweet nothings to his friend, our contestant is instructed to take their relationship to the next level, by locking lips with him in an unusual way. Co-host: Howie Mandel. END TIMES: The end is nigh, as this contestant must convince her friend that the world is coming to an end, then brace for impact by hiding under their table. Co-host: Kevin Nealon.

9.title: Kelly Osbourne and Moshe Kasher
9.plot: ESCORT: After dropping the news that she's an escort for older men, our contestant and her friend must deal with a creepy client, who wants to take them out for a night on the town. Co-host: Kelly Osbourne. PATRIOT: After sarcastically saluting a veteran, then swapping made-up war stories with the man, this contestant has his friend marching straight for the door. Co-host: Moshe Kasher.

10.title: David Koechner and Alex Mandel
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Bill & Giuliana Rancic and Alex Mandel
11.plot: LAUGHS: This contestant takes the saying "laughter is the best medicine" a little too seriously, after getting the giggles at his waiter's misfortunes. Co-hosts: Bill & Giuliana Rancic. THE ACCIDENT: H20 is what's on the menu during this prank that escalates when our contestant has an accident in his pants and needs the restaurant's help to dry them. Co-host: Alex Mandel.

12.title: Tom Green and WWE's the Miz
12.plot: LAUGHS: This contestant takes the saying "laughter is the best medicine" a little too seriously, after getting the giggles at his waiter's misfortunes. Co-hosts: Bill & Giuliana Rancic. THE ACCIDENT: H20 is what's on the menu during this prank that escalates when our contestant has an accident in his pants and needs the restaurant's help to dry them. Co-host: Alex Mandel.

imdb.title: Deal with It
plot: People are challenged to do risky tasks in public for a cash reward in this hidden camera ambush series.
